a.span: More COVID-19 Information and Previous Updates

strong.u: Beginning this Friday, April 24, our Friday pick-up meals will also include breakfast and lunch for SaturdayandSunday for students and siblings, ages 1-18!

br.span: So, for example, if youre picking up meals for three children on Friday, you also will receive breakfast and lunch for each of them for Saturday and Sunday.

Directions for reheating will be included in the weekend meals as hot meals will be on the menu those days as well. Lunch entrees will come with a milk and either a fruit, veggie, chips or cookies. Breakfast comes with a box of cereal or a cereal bar, fruit and milk.
for all students and siblings, ages 1-18.
br.strong: Meals can be picked up Monday-Friday from 10:30 am to Noon while supplies last.
br.span: Children do NOT need to be with you in order to receive their meals. If youre unable to pick up the meals, your students can pick them up if they can safely walk, or ride their bikes, scooters or skateboards to school, and you have given them permission to do so.

strong.u: Were thankful to our caf manager and staff for extending the free meals to the weekend.

br.span: This is an additional offering theyre thrilled to provide as weve heard over and over again what a great help these meals are to so many of our families.
We look forward to continuing to see you and your students at meal pick-up time!

strong.u: A partir de este viernes 24 de abril, nuestras comidas de recogida del viernes tambin incluirn desayuno y almuerzo los sbados y domingos para estudiantes y hermanos de 1 a 18 aos!

br.span: Entonces, por ejemplo, si est recogiendo comidas para tres nios el viernes, tambin recibir desayuno y almuerzo para cada uno de ellos el sbado y el domingo.

Las instrucciones para el recalentamiento se incluirn en las comidas de fin de semana, ya que las comidas calientes tambin estarn en el men esos das. Las entradas para el almuerzo vendrn con leche y frutas, verduras, papas fritas o galletas. El desayuno viene con una caja de cereal o una barra de cereal, fruta y leche.
Recuerde, las comidas son gratuitas para todos los estudiantes y hermanos, de 1 a 18 aos.
br.strong: Las comidas se pueden recoger de lunes a viernes de 10:30 a.m. a medioda hasta agotar existencias.
br.span: Los nios NO necesitan estar con usted para recibir sus comidas. Si no puede recoger las comidas, sus estudiantes pueden recogerlas si pueden caminar con seguridad o andar en bicicleta, patinetas o patinetas a la escuela, y usted les ha dado permiso para hacerlo.

strong.u: Agradecemos al gerente y al personal de nuestro caf por extender las comidas gratis hasta el fin de semana.

br.span: Esta es una oferta adicional que estn encantados de ofrecer, ya que hemos escuchado una y otra vez la gran ayuda que estas comidas son para muchas de nuestras familias.
Esperamos seguir vindote a ti y a tus estudiantes a la hora de recoger la comida!

br.br:
Parents Due to continuing concerns regarding Corornavirus/COVID-19 and our efforts toprevent the introduction and spread of the virus in our school and among our families, spring parent-teacher conferences have beencancelled. If you have concerns regarding your student and would like to meet with her/his teacher(s) before the end of the school year, please contact the teacher to arrange a time to meet. Likewise, if there are students in which teachers are concerned, their parents will be contacted by the teacher. Thank you for your understanding and care as we continue to keep our school community safe and healthy.
March 9, 2020 COVID-19 SWDH Parent Letter
Southwest District Health Guidelines - COVID-19 Document
2020 Coronavirus Parent Letter - Safety Procedures
***Liberty will be switching to a new lunch software. There will be a New Pay for Student Meals Online.
You can set up your account as early as 1/16/2020,but will not be able to use it until January 23rd.We will ask that you dont add money the old ezschoolpay after that date. Any money left on the ezschoolpay will be transferred on January 22nd.***
Liberty MySchoolBucks Document

br.font: Liberty Charter School is grounded in the belief that when there is low threat and content is highly challenging, accelerated learning takes place.
Liberty Charter Schools mission is to develop students who are competent, confident, productive and responsible young adults who possess the habits, skills and attitudes to succeed in life.
